languages.text: "Далее офицеры, проживающие подле покоев Леди-Навигатора, стали впадать в несвойственные им состояния — истерику, апатию, эйфорию, гнев. Это подрывает боевой дух и эффективность команды. Последний инцидент зафиксирован на Футфоле. На корабль доставили около сотни птиц — каждая стоила немалых денег, однако мне так и не удалось узнать об их назначении и дальнейшей судьбе".

traits.locale_text: "Далее офицеры, проживающие подле покоев Леди-Навигатора, стали впадать в несвойственные им состояния — истерику, апатию, эйфорию, гнев. Это подрывает боевой дух и эффективность команды. Последний инцидент зафиксирован на Футфоле. На корабль доставили около сотни птиц — каждая стоила немалых денег, однако мне так и не удалось узнать об их назначении и дальнейшей судьбе".

languages.text: "After that, officers living near the Lady Navigator's quarters began to express extreme emotions — hysteria, apathy, euphoria, rage. This is quite detrimental to crew morale and performance. The last incident was recorded on Footfall. Around a hundred living birds were delivered on board during our stay on Footfall. Each bird cost a hefty sum, but I have failed to discover their purpose and subsequent fate."
languages.original_text: "Далее офицеры, проживающие подле покоев Леди-Навигатора, стали впадать в несвойственные им состояния — истерику, апатию, эйфорию, гнев. Это подрывает боевой дух и эффективность команды. Последний инцидент зафиксирован на Футфоле. На корабль доставили около сотни птиц — каждая стоила немалых денег, однако мне так и не удалось узнать об их назначении и дальнейшей судьбе".

traits.locale_text: "Further on, the officers living near the chambers of the Lady Navigator began to express extreme emotions — hysteria, apathy, euphoria, anger. This is quite detrimental to the spirits and efficiency of the crew. The last incident was registered on Footfall. Around a hundred living birds was delivered on board during the Footfall stay. Each of them cost a hefty sum, but I still failed to learn about their origin and eventual destiny."

"Further on, the officers living near the chambers of the Lady Navigator began to express extreme emotions — hysteria, apathy, euphoria, anger. This is quite detrimental to the spirits and efficiency of the crew. The last incident was registered on Footfall. Around a hundred living birds was delivered on board during the Footfall stay. Each of them cost a hefty sum, but I still failed to learn about their origin and eventual destiny."

"After that, officers living near the Lady Navigator's quarters began to express extreme emotions — hysteria, apathy, euphoria, rage. This is quite detrimental to crew morale and performance. The last incident was recorded on Footfall. Around a hundred living birds were delivered on board during our stay on Footfall. Each bird cost a hefty sum, but I have failed to discover their purpose and subsequent fate."

"After that, officers living near the Lady Navigator's quarters began to express extreme emotions — hysteria, apathy, euphoria, rage. This is quite detrimental to crew morale and performance. The last incident was recorded on Footfall. Around a hundred living birds were delivered on board during our stay on Footfall. Each bird cost a hefty sum, but I have failed to discover their purpose and subsequent fate."

"After that, officers living near the Lady Navigator's quarters began to express extreme emotions — hysteria, apathy, euphoria, rage. This is quite detrimental to crew morale and performance. The last incident was recorded on Footfall. Around a hundred living birds were delivered on board during our stay on Footfall. Each bird cost a hefty sum, but I have failed to discover their purpose and subsequent fate."

languages.text: “在那之后，所有住在导航者女士住处附近的军官，都表现出了极端情绪——歇斯底里、冷漠、兴奋、愤怒。这对船员的士气与工作造成了相当不利的影响。最后一起事故发生在落脚港。我们在落脚港停留期间，大约有一百只活鸟被运到了船上，每只鸟都花了一大笔钱，但我并没弄清楚那些鸟究竟是用来做什么的，也不清楚它们后来怎么样了。”
languages.original_text: "After that, officers living near the Lady Navigator's quarters began to express extreme emotions — hysteria, apathy, euphoria, rage. This is quite detrimental to crew morale and performance. The last incident was recorded on Footfall. Around a hundred living birds were delivered on board during our stay on Footfall. Each bird cost a hefty sum, but I have failed to discover their purpose and subsequent fate."

traits.locale_text: “在那之后，所有住在导航者女士住处附近的军官，都表现出了极端情绪——歇斯底里、冷漠、兴奋、愤怒。这对船员的士气与工作造成了相当不利的影响。最后一起事故发生在落脚港。我们在落脚港停留期间，大约有一百只活鸟被运到了船上，每只鸟都花了一大笔钱，但我并没弄清楚那些鸟究竟是用来做什么的，也不清楚它们后来怎么样了。”

languages.text: «Después de eso, los oficiales que vivían cerca de los aposentos de la lady Navegante empezaron a mostrar emociones extremas: histeria, apatía, euforia, ira... Esto es nocivo para la moral y el rendimiento de la tripulación. El último incidente registrado tuvo lugar durante nuestra estancia en Paso, cuando se llevó a bordo un centenar de pájaros vivos. Cada uno de ellos conllevó un elevado precio, pero no he logrado discernir su propósito ni su posterior destino».
languages.original_text: "After that, officers living near the Lady Navigator's quarters began to express extreme emotions — hysteria, apathy, euphoria, rage. This is quite detrimental to crew morale and performance. The last incident was recorded on Footfall. Around a hundred living birds were delivered on board during our stay on Footfall. Each bird cost a hefty sum, but I have failed to discover their purpose and subsequent fate."

traits.locale_text: «Después de eso, los oficiales que vivían cerca de los aposentos de la lady Navegante empezaron a mostrar emociones extremas: histeria, apatía, euforia, ira... Esto es nocivo para la moral y el rendimiento de la tripulación. El último incidente registrado tuvo lugar durante nuestra estancia en Paso, cuando se llevó a bordo un centenar de pájaros vivos. Cada uno de ellos conllevó un elevado precio, pero no he logrado discernir su propósito ni su posterior destino».

languages.text: "Einige Zeit später traten bei Offizieren, die unweit des Quartiers der Lady Navigator untergebracht waren, extreme Emotionen auf ... Hysterie, Apathie, Euphorie, Wut. Das alles ist der Moral und Leistung der Crew ausgesprochen abträglich. Der letzte Zwischenfall wurde auf Footfall vermerkt. Während unseres Aufenthaltes dort wurden etwa hundert lebende Vögel an Bord gebracht. Jeder einzelne Vogel war exorbitant teuer, aber über ihren Zweck und ihr Schicksal ist mir nichts bekannt."
languages.original_text: "After that, officers living near the Lady Navigator's quarters began to express extreme emotions — hysteria, apathy, euphoria, rage. This is quite detrimental to crew morale and performance. The last incident was recorded on Footfall. Around a hundred living birds were delivered on board during our stay on Footfall. Each bird cost a hefty sum, but I have failed to discover their purpose and subsequent fate."

traits.locale_text: "Einige Zeit später traten bei Offizieren, die unweit des Quartiers der Lady Navigator untergebracht waren, extreme Emotionen auf ... Hysterie, Apathie, Euphorie, Wut. Das alles ist der Moral und Leistung der Crew ausgesprochen abträglich. Der letzte Zwischenfall wurde auf Footfall vermerkt. Während unseres Aufenthaltes dort wurden etwa hundert lebende Vögel an Bord gebracht. Jeder einzelne Vogel war exorbitant teuer, aber über ihren Zweck und ihr Schicksal ist mir nichts bekannt."

languages.text: « Après cela, les officiers vivant près des quartiers de la navigatrice ont commencé à manifester des émotions extrêmes... hystérie, apathie, euphorie ou rage. Tout cela est très préjudiciable au moral et aux performances de l'équipage. Le dernier incident s'est produit sur Castel. Une centaine d'oiseaux vivants a été livrée à bord lors de notre escale. Chacun de ces animaux coûte une petite fortune, mais je n'ai pas pu découvrir à quoi ils étaient censés servir ni ce qu'ils sont devenus. »
languages.original_text: "After that, officers living near the Lady Navigator's quarters began to express extreme emotions — hysteria, apathy, euphoria, rage. This is quite detrimental to crew morale and performance. The last incident was recorded on Footfall. Around a hundred living birds were delivered on board during our stay on Footfall. Each bird cost a hefty sum, but I have failed to discover their purpose and subsequent fate."

traits.locale_text: « Après cela, les officiers vivant près des quartiers de la navigatrice ont commencé à manifester des émotions extrêmes... hystérie, apathie, euphorie ou rage. Tout cela est très préjudiciable au moral et aux performances de l'équipage. Le dernier incident s'est produit sur Castel. Une centaine d'oiseaux vivants a été livrée à bord lors de notre escale. Chacun de ces animaux coûte une petite fortune, mais je n'ai pas pu découvrir à quoi ils étaient censés servir ni ce qu'ils sont devenus. »

languages.text: 「そしてその後、レディ航宙士の住居の近くに住む士官達は、ヒステリー、無関心、高揚感、激怒と過激な感情を表し始めたのです。これは、クルーの士気と仕事ぶりにひどい悪影響を及ぼします。最後の事件は、フットフォールで確認されました。フットフォール滞在中に、約100羽の生きた鳥が船に届きました。一羽一羽の値段は高額で、私はその目的と行き着く結果に気づくことができなかったのです」
languages.original_text: "After that, officers living near the Lady Navigator's quarters began to express extreme emotions — hysteria, apathy, euphoria, rage. This is quite detrimental to crew morale and performance. The last incident was recorded on Footfall. Around a hundred living birds were delivered on board during our stay on Footfall. Each bird cost a hefty sum, but I have failed to discover their purpose and subsequent fate."

traits.locale_text: 「そしてその後、レディ航宙士の住居の近くに住む士官達は、ヒステリー、無関心、高揚感、激怒と過激な感情を表し始めたのです。これは、クルーの士気と仕事ぶりにひどい悪影響を及ぼします。最後の事件は、フットフォールで確認されました。フットフォール滞在中に、約100羽の生きた鳥が船に届きました。一羽一羽の値段は高額で、私はその目的と行き着く結果に気づくことができなかったのです」

languages.text: "Bir de Leydi Rotacı'nın yakınında yaşayan subaylarımızda aşırı duygular gözlemlemeye başladık. Histeri, ilgisizlik, aşırı neşe, öfke gibi. Bu da hâliyle mürettebatın moral ve performansını olumsuz etkiliyor. Kayıttaki son hadise ise Binliman'da gerçekleşti. Binliman'da kaldığımız sırada gemiye yüz kadar canlı kuş getirildi. Kuşların her biri epey pahalıydı ama amaçlarını ve akıbetlerini öğrenemedim."
languages.original_text: "After that, officers living near the Lady Navigator's quarters began to express extreme emotions — hysteria, apathy, euphoria, rage. This is quite detrimental to crew morale and performance. The last incident was recorded on Footfall. Around a hundred living birds were delivered on board during our stay on Footfall. Each bird cost a hefty sum, but I have failed to discover their purpose and subsequent fate."
